[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.

src_text: Berri yenna-d d akken "ad yuɣal ɣer Teksas i wakken ad ssitegeɣ igemmaḍen n temlilit n ugraw n umni n yiḍ-agi, ad ɣeṭseɣ ma yella ubrid i yiman-iw deg umsizzel-agi", maca sakkin yenna-d d akken ad yeqqim deg umsizzel yerna ad yili deg tmenyugert n tazwara n 21 di Yennayer di Karulina n Unẓul.
ref_text: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
hyp_text: He said that he would go to Texas to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life, to get some peace and quiet, but he said he would stay in the South and live in the small town of 21, Carolina, on January 1st.

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.

hyp_text: Japan has a total of 7,000 islands (including the main islands of Honshu), which makes Japan the country with the most islands in the world!

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.

[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.

[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.

[Kabyle]: Maca, akk Ibeljiken d Iswissiyen yettmeslayen Tafranṣiṣt lemden Tafranṣiṣt tamagnut deg uɣerbaz, ihi ad izmiren ad k-fehmen ɣas akken tesxedmeḍ anagraw n wuṭṭunen Afranṣiṣ amagnu.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Kabyle]: Zrant tsutin, imdanen bnan s leḥder ifellayen ɣef yimeẓriyen untimen, iḥecrarfen s ufella n iceṛfan iwehhan ɣer yilel.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Kabyle]: 800 n yimaylen n Unagraw n Tsenfarin n Ubiṭrul Iεeddan ɣef Alaska ɣelqen-t seld mi d-nneɣlen igiman n tbettiyin n ubiṭrul aḥrur deg unẓul n Ferbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Kabyle]: Iḥricen n Tbelǧikt n wass-a ttekkan naqal ɣer Luksemburg maca uɣalen d Ibelǧiken seld Tanekra Tabelǧikit deg yiseggasen n 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Kabyle]: Si tazwara-ines, Aẓalim yuɣal d tamnekda s tidet n umkadan n uɣmis, s teẓṛigt n usiggez, d usmel web i d-ijebbden 5,000,000 n yinerza dzg waggur n Tuber, isussanen-nsen, aẓeṭṭa n yisalen n 24 n yesragen, tidwilin s tmesliwt, ma d tura suffɣen-d agraw n tkarḍiwin tirakalin n umaḍal i wumi qqaren Amaḍal-neɣ Abudali.
